title.narrative: Capacity Building Support for Asia-Pacific Metrology Programme

description.narrative: The Asia-Pacific Metrology Programme (APMP) is a grouping of national metrology institutes (NMIs) from the Asia-Pacific region engaged in improving regional metrological capability through the sharing of expertise and exchange of technical services among Member laboratories. APMP aims to promote and support a measurement infrastructure in the Asia-Pacific region that facilitates international trade, improves industrial efficiency and competitiveness, ensures equity in the marketplace, and enhances the quality of life and the environment. Funding under this initiative by the Australian Department of Industry supports development of and international recognition for regional measurement competence. By Dec 2012, NMI had taken on the Chairmanship of APMP, as well as chairing one APMP Technical Committee and being a member of the Developing Economies' Committee (DEC).
